5.text: [crocal_single_image image="3422" retina_image="3423" inherit_align="left" margin_bottom="24"][vc_column_text]Crocal is a super user-friendly, yet superb powerful multi-purpose WordPress theme. Its philosophy, in the backend as well as in the front-end, allows users to design sites which lead to awesomeness and nothing less. [/vc_column_text]
